segments.text: I notice the woman is completely oblivious to the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and it’s kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far to reach those cookies, and the stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is being smart by standing back and waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are going to have a great time eating those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn’t tip over and ruin everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting so wet, and it’s going to be a big mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR
